About

Senior Full Stack Developer

  I am a Senior Full Stack Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing scalable web applications using JavaScript, MERN stack, PHP, Laravel, and Python. My expertise includes creating robust backend systems and dynamic frontend interfaces, with a strong focus on enhancing user experiences.

  I have successfully led projects in various industries, leveraging AWS services and Apache Kafka for real-time data processing. I thrive in Agile environments, collaborating with teams to deliver impactful solutions while mentoring junior developers. I am looking for remote opportunities to contribute to innovative projects and expand my skill set.

Current Focus: Accessibility // React // Design Systems

Experience

Canva

Senior Full Stack Engineer

The all-in-one design platform for creating stunning visuals, presentations, and marketing content effortlessly.

  • Led the design and development of applications using both MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) and PHP/Laravel for backend logic.
  • Implemented microservices architecture using Node.js and WebSocket, enabling real-time data synchronization and reducing server response time by 35%.
  • Leveraged AWS services such as SQS, SNS, and Lambda for scalable and efficient cloud-based solutions, improving system reliability and reducing costs.
  • Integrated Apache Kafka to manage data streaming across microservices, ensuring smooth communication and high-throughput data processing.
  • Developed highly interactive user interfaces using React.js, optimizing page load times and improving the user experience for 1 million+ users.
  • Collaborated with DevOps teams to implement CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker, ensuring smooth deployments and automated testing.
  • Delivered technical leadership on complex projects, mentoring junior developers and conducting regular code reviews to maintain high-quality standards.
May 2021 - July 204 | Sydney, New South Wales, Australia

Microsystem Ai WiFi

Senior Full Stack Developer

Cloud-based internet management and WiFi marketing solutions tailored for businesses to control access, boost security, and drive revenue

  • Led migration of Laravel from version 5.2 to the latest version, ensuring 100% functionality retention during the MySQL to MongoDB transition.
  • Developed core features, leading to a 40% performance boost in high-traffic areas.
  • Utilized Azure services for scalable application deployment and management, achieving 99.9% uptime.
  • Used PHPUnit for unit testing and implemented CI/CD pipelines.
  • Managed a team of 5 developers, successfully delivering 10+ major features.
  • Built scalable backend systems using Python (Flask, FastAPI) for healthcare and logistics, ensuring high availability and efficient data processing.
  • Introduced Apache Kafka to handle large-scale data streaming and real-time event processing, leading to a 60% increase in system throughput.
  • Developed RESTful APIs that processed over 100,000 transactions monthly, ensuring smooth operation for clients in multiple industries.
  • Collaborated with frontend teams to integrate Python-based APIs with React.js and other frontend frameworks, ensuring seamless communication between client and server.
  • Optimized application performance by implementing caching strategies and improving database query efficiency.
  • Worked within Agile teams, delivering features on time and participating in regular sprint retrospectives to continuously improve processes.
Feb 2018 - Apr 2021 | Smart Village, Giza

Globe Telecom

Software Developer

Leading telecom provider offering mobile, internet, and digital financial services for seamless connectivity and lifestyle solutions in the Philippines.

  • Developed internal web applications using PHP, Laravel, and Vue.js, improving user satisfaction by 15%.
  • Contributed to a tool processing 500,000+ transactions daily, ensuring 99.9% uptime.
  • Collaborated on AWS cloud services integration for secure data storage and analytics.
  • Used PHPUnit for testing and automated deployment workflows.
  • Implemented real-time inventory tracking systems using Node.js and WebSocket, providing instant product updates to customers and boosting engagement.
  • Managed cloud environments using Azure, migrating legacy systems and improving system scalability by leveraging cloud-based architecture.
  • Developed headless CMS solutions with WordPress and Zoho, allowing flexible content management across client platforms.
  • Regularly conducted code reviews to ensure high-quality standards and best practices were followed across the team.
  • Delivered technical documentation for projects, enabling easier future maintenance and enhancements.
Aug 2015 - Jan 2018 | Bonifacio Global City (BGC), Taguig, Metro Manila, Philippines

PLDT

Junior Software Developer

High-speed fiber internet with seamless WiFi coverage and smart home solutions, designed for families and businesses in the Philippines.

  • Assisted in the development of a CRM system for over 1 million users, improving response times by 15%.
  • Supported large-scale system upgrades and contributed to 5 major projects.
  • Gained experience in on-premise to cloud migration and basic AWS services.
  • Developed full-stack web applications using PHP/Laravel on the backend and JavaScript for dynamic frontend functionalities.
  • Collaborated with design teams to implement responsive user interfaces using CSS and Tailwind CSS, ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
  • Optimized backend API responses, improving system performance and reducing server load.
  • Worked closely with senior developers to debug and maintain existing applications, gaining valuable experience in troubleshooting and performance optimization.
  • Participated in daily Agile stand-ups and sprint reviews, helping the team meet project milestones.
  • Contributed to the successful delivery of 10+ projects by assisting in the planning and execution phases.
May 2008 - July 2015 | Makati City, Metro Manila, Philippines
